00016 #ifndef BT_MULTIBODY_CONSTRAINT_H
00017 #define BT_MULTIBODY_CONSTRAINT_H

00023 class btMultiBody;
00024 struct btSolverInfo;

00026 #include "btMultiBodySolverConstraint.h"

00028 struct btMultiBodyJacobianData
00029 {
00030         btAlignedObjectArray<btScalar>          m_jacobians;
00031         btAlignedObjectArray<btScalar>          m_deltaVelocitiesUnitImpulse;   //holds the joint-space response of the corresp. tree to the test impulse in each constraint space dimension
00032         btAlignedObjectArray<btScalar>          m_deltaVelocities;                              //holds joint-space vectors of all the constrained trees accumulating the effect of corrective impulses applied in SI
00033         btAlignedObjectArray<btScalar>          scratch_r;
00034         btAlignedObjectArray<btVector3>         scratch_v;
00035         btAlignedObjectArray<btMatrix3x3>       scratch_m;
00036         btAlignedObjectArray<btSolverBody>*     m_solverBodyPool;
00037         int                                                                     m_fixedBodyId;
00038 
00039 };
00040 
00041 
00042 ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(class) btMultiBodyConstraint
00043 {
00044 protected:
00045 
00046         btMultiBody*    m_bodyA;
00047     btMultiBody*        m_bodyB;
00048     int                         m_linkA;
00049     int                         m_linkB;
00050 
00051     int                         m_numRows;
00052     int                         m_jacSizeA;
00053     int                         m_jacSizeBoth;
00054     int                         m_posOffset;
00055 
00056         bool                    m_isUnilateral;
00057         int                             m_numDofsFinalized;
00058         btScalar                m_maxAppliedImpulse;
00059 
00060 
00061     // warning: the data block lay out is not consistent for all constraints
00062     // data block laid out as follows:
00063     // cached impulses. (one per row.)
00064     // jacobians. (interleaved, row1 body1 then row1 body2 then row2 body 1 etc)
00065     // positions. (one per row.)
00066     btAlignedObjectArray<btScalar> m_data;
00067 
00068         void    applyDeltaVee(btMultiBodyJacobianData& data, btScalar* delta_vee, btScalar impulse, int velocityIndex, int ndof);
00069     
00070         btScalar fillMultiBodyConstraint(btMultiBodySolverConstraint& solverConstraint,
00071                                                                                                                                 btMultiBodyJacobianData& data,
00072                                      btScalar* jacOrgA, btScalar* jacOrgB,
00073                                      const btVector3& constraintNormalAng,
00074                                      
00075                                                                                                                                 const btVector3& constraintNormalLin,
00076                                                                                                                                 const btVector3& posAworld, const btVector3& posBworld,
00077                                                                                                                                 btScalar posError,
00078                                                                                                                                 const btContactSolverInfo& infoGlobal,
00079                                      btScalar lowerLimit, btScalar upperLimit,
00080                                      bool angConstraint = false,
00081                                      
00082                                                                                                                                 btScalar relaxation = 1.f,
00083                                                                                                                                 bool isFriction = false, btScalar desiredVelocity=0, btScalar cfmSlip=0);
00084 
00085 public:
00086 
00087         BT_DECLARE_ALIGNED_ALLOCATOR();
00088 
00089         btMultiBodyConstraint(btMultiBody* bodyA,btMultiBody* bodyB,int linkA, int linkB, int numRows, bool isUnilateral);
00090         virtual ~btMultiBodyConstraint();
00091 
00092         void updateJacobianSizes();
00093         void allocateJacobiansMultiDof();
00094 
00095         //many constraints have setFrameInB/setPivotInB. Will use 'getConstraintType' later.
00096         virtual void setFrameInB(const btMatrix3x3& frameInB) {}
00097         virtual void setPivotInB(const btVector3& pivotInB){}
00098 
00099         virtual void finalizeMultiDof()=0;
00100 
00101         virtual int getIslandIdA() const =0;
00102         virtual int getIslandIdB() const =0;
00103 
00104         virtual void createConstraintRows(btMultiBodyConstraintArray& constraintRows,
00105                 btMultiBodyJacobianData& data,
00106                 const btContactSolverInfo& infoGlobal)=0;
00107 
00108         int     getNumRows() const
00109         {
00110                 return m_numRows;
00111         }
00112 
00113         btMultiBody*    getMultiBodyA()
00114         {
00115                 return m_bodyA;
00116         }
00117     btMultiBody*        getMultiBodyB()
00118         {
00119                 return m_bodyB;
00120         }
00121 
00122         void    internalSetAppliedImpulse(int dof, btScalar appliedImpulse)
00123         {
00124                 btAssert(dof>=0);
00125                 btAssert(dof < getNumRows());
00126                 m_data[dof] = appliedImpulse;
00127         
00128         }
00129         
00130         btScalar        getAppliedImpulse(int dof)
00131         {
00132                 btAssert(dof>=0);
00133                 btAssert(dof < getNumRows());
00134                 return m_data[dof];
00135         }
00136         // current constraint position
00137     // constraint is pos >= 0 for unilateral, or pos = 0 for bilateral
00138     // NOTE: ignored position for friction rows.
00139     btScalar getPosition(int row) const
00140         {
00141                 return m_data[m_posOffset + row];
00142         }
00143 
00144     void setPosition(int row, btScalar pos)
00145         {
00146                 m_data[m_posOffset + row] = pos;
00147         }
00148 
00149 
00150         bool isUnilateral() const
00151         {
00152                 return m_isUnilateral;
00153         }
00154 
00155         // jacobian blocks.
00156     // each of size 6 + num_links. (jacobian2 is null if no body2.)
00157     // format: 3 'omega' coefficients, 3 'v' coefficients, then the 'qdot' coefficients.
00158     btScalar* jacobianA(int row)
00159         {
00160                 return &m_data[m_numRows + row * m_jacSizeBoth];
00161         }
00162     const btScalar* jacobianA(int row) const
00163         {
00164                 return &m_data[m_numRows + (row * m_jacSizeBoth)];
00165         }
00166     btScalar* jacobianB(int row)
00167         {
00168                 return &m_data[m_numRows + (row * m_jacSizeBoth) + m_jacSizeA];
00169         }
00170     const btScalar* jacobianB(int row) const
00171         {
00172                 return &m_data[m_numRows + (row * m_jacSizeBoth) + m_jacSizeA];
00173         }
00174 
00175         btScalar        getMaxAppliedImpulse() const
00176         {
00177                 return m_maxAppliedImpulse;
00178         }
00179         void    setMaxAppliedImpulse(btScalar maxImp)
00180         {
00181                 m_maxAppliedImpulse = maxImp;
00182         }
00183 
00184         virtual void debugDraw(class btIDebugDraw* drawer)=0;
00185 
00186         virtual void setGearRatio(btScalar ratio) {}
00187         virtual void setGearAuxLink(int gearAuxLink) {}
00188         virtual void setRelativePositionTarget(btScalar relPosTarget){}
00189         virtual void setErp(btScalar erp){}
00190         
00191         
00192 };
00193 
00194 #endif //BT_MULTIBODY_CONSTRAINT_H
